basic_info.description: Shelby Huffman currently resides in Oklahoma City and is a Software Engineer for Boeing and a Front Ensemble Educator for multiple schools and organizations in Oklahoma. Shelby has earned a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and a Bachelor of Arts in Mathematics from the University of Oklahoma. Currently, he is pursuing a Master's in Computer Science with a specialization in Computational Perception and Robotics from the Georgia Institute of Technology. Shelby had the privilege of beginning his musical journey with Resistance for three years from '14-'16. He played tenors at Choctaw high school and played snare for the University of Oklahoma Drumline. Shelby began his world-class front ensemble journey with Gateway Indoor in '17 and then Monarch Independent in '19. During his summers, Shelby marched Mandarins in '16, Crossmen from '17-'18, and aged out at The Cavaliers in '19. Shelby is still an active marimba player as a duo partner with Tim Bartee II.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
